Articles.Content:
What is the sequence of assembly and useful ideas for the 'radial coupler'?

I didn\'t see the radial coupler at first and could never get the thing to hook to other stages without blowing up or breaking itself.

Once I found that piece I was left questioning why it would hang out of the bottom of the lander in thin air, etc.

I must be doing something wrong. Is there a simple lander with a rocket stage attached to download?

Or maybe just a simple assembly diagram or instructions?

Lander 0.5 currently available has a texture glitch. Use some image editing program (I\'ve used XNView) to convert all four \'lander.png\' files (found in folders Parts\LanderFueltank\textures etc..) to 32-bit PNG.

Correctly assembled lander should look as follows:
